text: I used PMQs to challenge the UK gov on why they are  still refusing the repeated calls to introduce a guaranteed minimum income for everyone. Without it, millions of people are being left without the financial support they are in desperate need for. #Coronavirus #PMQs https://t.co/RqNSF3E7xx
